About the job

Role Overview

We are looking for a UI/UX Designer who can think beyond screens and understands user behaviour, user psychology, and product strategy.

You will work closely with founders, product teams, and developers to design modern, scalable, and technically feasible interfaces for startup products at different stages—MVP to scale.

This role requires clarity of thinking, ownership of UX decisions, and strong communication, not just tool expertise.




Key ResponsibilitiesUX & Product Thinking
Translate business goals and product requirements into clear UX solutions
Conduct user research, surveys, and usability validation
Define user flows, information architecture, and UX frameworks
Identify UX priorities tied to KPIs (conversion, retention, onboarding)




Design Execution
Create wireframes, prototypes, and high-fidelity UI
Design interfaces that are:
Aesthetically strong
Technically feasible
Security-conscious
Ensure consistency using design systems and components




Collaboration & Communication
Participate in structured reviews with internal teams and clients
Clearly explain design rationale behind every major decision
Share written summaries after reviews for alignment and documentation
Work closely with developers for clean handoffs




Delivery & Documentation
Prepare developer-ready Figma files
Maintain UX documentation used post project
Support quick iterations and provide quick support during development




What We’re Looking ForMust-Have Skills
Strong portfolio demonstrating UX thinking + UI execution
Experience designing startup products, SaaS platforms, or dashboards
Solid understanding of:
User behaviour & psychology
Responsive and modern UI patterns
UX research fundamentals
Proficiency in Figma (mandatory)




Nice-to-Have
Experience working with global (US/EU) clients
Familiarity with healthcare, SaaS, or B2B products
Experience working in an outsourced / agency environment
Ability to defend UX decisions with logic, not opinions




What This Role Is NOT
Pure visual/UI-only role
“Follow instructions and design screens” job
Freelance-style, unstructured work

We expect designers to take ownership of UX, not wait for pixel-level instructions.




Why Join DesigngridStudios
Work directly with founders and decision-makers
Exposure to global startup ecosystems
Real impact on products that scale and raise funding
Clear processes, strong UX culture, and respect for design thinking
Opportunity to grow into Senior UX / Product Designer roles
